auth.midware.privateRoute: Page available only for authenticated users
auth.midware.publicRoute: Page available only for guest users
auth.midware.userNotFound: User not found or hasn't not created yet
auth.error.userNotFound: User not found or hasn't not created yet
auth.error.userExists: User with this email already exists. Use password recovery or enter another email
auth.success.registerMessage: An instruction on completing registration has been sent to your email
auth.success.emailConfirmMessage: Registration complete, your account verified successful!
auth.success.passwordResetMessage: An instruction on completing password recovery has been sent to your email
